 what is the difference between G1 and G2
  Legendarynemasis@... wrote: Correction, in G1 the Matrix of Leadership was destroyed, not in the movie 
however. In the movie half of the Matrix was used to defeat Unicron. Then in 
The Return of Optimus Prime Optimus used the other half to destroy the hate 
plague that was causing all those affected to go insane and blasting those 
who weren't infected and infecting them. The shell of the Matrix was then 
used and destroyed in another episode of G1, the reason for doing so I don't 
recall but in G1 the matrix of leadership was eventually gone.
